BadgeDetail.Name: Business Planning
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge can develop a business plan. They can articulate their plan using the business canvas that identifies the value proposition they plan to deliver, the customers they will reach and the infrastructure and finances required to do this.

Task.Title: Business model canvas
Task.Body: Upload a completed business model canvas using the template provided.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload a completed business model canvas using the template provided.
Task.TextileBody: Upload a completed business model canvas using the template provided.
